column4: Wow, I just installed Ubuntu on my laptop to replace Debian, and I am absolutely floored.
45 seconds from boot to login screen, and another 25 seconds for me to type my password and for me to be at a desktop, no thrashing.
And suspend to disk worked out of the box! You have no idea how amazed I am. Good work, everybody!
yeah, even my laptops media keys worked out of the box
